welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Marostica, a charming city known for its beautiful medieval castle and annual living chess game. We invite you to explore our picturesque streets, taste our delicious cuisine, and immerse yourself in our rich culture. Enjoy your stay in Marostica!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Trissino Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Trissino Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at S. Angelo Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at S. Angelo Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
